description: Five strangers arrive at a bus terminal, each carrying a dark secret. Unresolved issues including crimes of passion, greed and murder haunt them. Assisted by an obscure and stoic Trailways clerk whose behavior vacillates between g...
name: Redemption

review.name: With a production size that big, I expected a LOT more.
review.reviewBody: I saw this film at last year's New York International Independent Film & Video Festival in September. First of all, there were about twenty people in the audience (which was about the average for the entire festival) and second, I don't think I've been that bored in a theater seat before in my entire life. Along with that, I saw lights in shots, sound effects missing, the words not matching the lips, basically a continuing disaster from the get-go. Now, I heard that the director made this in 16 days. Okay, so what? You made a horrible movie. Take your time on the next one, and maybe you won't have people getting up and walking out forty minutes into it.
